original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business requirements and operate at peak efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing new processes and implementing technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovation and streamline operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex issues
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to leverage data-driven insights to inform decision-making

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to effectively configure and maintain the [mention specific system] backend
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence concepts and their practical applications

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a role that blends business analysis and technical configuration, with a proven track record of delivering successful projects
- Demonstrated experience in the vehicle configuration space, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and familiarity with Agile methodologies
- Previous exposure to vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing a valuable foundation for this role

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration and management
- Database querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Power BI)
- Agile project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Emphasis on continuous improvement and the implementation of innovative solutions
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a focus on delivering high-quality results

Role Overview:
This role is a pivotal position within our organization, serving as the bridge between business needs and technical implementation. As a highly skilled and adaptable professional, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations, ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects the evolving needs of our organization. Your expertise in leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) will be instrumental in driving innovation and optimizing our vehicle configuration processes.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Utilize your strong technical proficiency to configure and maintain the [mention specific system] backend, including developing and modifying data mappings, integrations, and system specifications
- Implement and test new configurations, ensuring they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Analyze existing data to identify optimization opportunities, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to drive data-driven decision-making
- Proactively propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and effective ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to quickly identify and address complex issues
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to leverage data-driven insights to inform decision-making
- Demonstrated expertise in machine learning and artificial intelligence, and the ability to apply these technologies to enhance vehicle configuration processes

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to effectively configure and maintain the [mention specific system] backend
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a role that combines business analysis and technical configuration, with a proven track record of delivering successful projects
- Extensive experience in the vehicle configuration space, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Previous exposure to Agile project management and the ability to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment
- Experience with vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing a valuable foundation for this role

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration and management
- Database querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms and frameworks
- Agile project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Emphasis on continuous improvement and the implementation of innovative, data-driven solutions
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a focus on delivering high-quality results and driving organizational efficiency

Role Overview:
This role is a critical component of our organization's efforts to streamline and optimize our vehicle configuration processes. As a highly skilled and versatile professional, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between business requirements and technical implementation, ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects the evolving needs of our stakeholders. Your expertise in leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) will be instrumental in driving innovation and enhancing the efficiency of our operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate these business requirements into effective technical configurations within the [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Proactively identify and address configuration-related issues, leveraging your strong troubleshooting skills to ensure the system operates at peak efficiency
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to drive data-driven decision-making
- Propose and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes, enhance system efficiency, and deliver measurable improvements
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and effective ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to quickly identify and address complex issues
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and visualization, with the ability to leverage data-driven insights to inform decision-making and drive continuous improvement
- Demonstrated expertise in machine learning and artificial intelligence, and the ability to apply these technologies to enhance vehicle configuration processes

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to effectively configure and maintain the [mention specific system] backend
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7 years of experience in a role that combines business analysis and technical configuration, with a proven track record of delivering successful projects that drive measurable improvements
- Extensive experience in the vehicle configuration space, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Previous exposure to Agile project management and the ability to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment
- Experience with vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing a valuable foundation for this role

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration and management
- Database querying and reporting tools (e.g., SQL, Excel, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms and frameworks
- Agile project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Emphasis on continuous improvement and the implementation of innovative, data-driven solutions that drive measurable business impact
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a focus on delivering high-quality results and driving organizational efficiency and transformation
